channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipped articles, 24th July
item.description:
There are piles of discarded items along Lee Conservancy Road and on Mabley Green. This is a continuing problem. Not sure if the items are dumped by residents or by fly tippers. Items dumped between Poplar Close, Lockgate Close and by bin at No 13
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lee Conservancy Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sheets of cardboard blocking pavement, 24th July
item.description:
There are sheets of heavy duty cardboard blocking the pavement at the bottom of Maximfeldt Road. This cardboard was originally dumped in the alley a few days ago but yesterday the alley was cleared and the cardboard is now dumped on the pavement
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Maximfeldt Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly fucking tipping i just selected that., 24th July
item.description:
The fly tipping on Mell street is daily. If it was happening in west Greenwich you’d be all over it. Greenwich council street cleaners and collection Lorry’s drive past and plainly do sweet FA. Please sort this

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mell Street, East Greenwich, London
